question: Why do these boats are painted in different color? Choices: trend, security, custom, visibility
generated_rationale: The boats are painted in different colors to make them more visible and easily identifiable in the water. This is particularly important for safety reasons, as it helps prevent collisions between boats or with other objects in the water. The bright colors also make it easier for boat owners to locate their boats when they return to the marina or docking area.
